TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Yemen, title = Yemen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yemen} }

S.FORM: Yemen hya' ga cyux maki' tay 15 00 N, 48 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 527,968 sq km (maki' tay 50ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 527,968 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 27,392,779. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga44.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 1%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 54.50%. kinmhgan(Koka) qani ga,'buyan nya squ kska na hezyal qu cinbwanan. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Sanaa. Kay ru gaga qnxan qqnxan pinbaqan = =snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' = snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 22 na tay ymagal byacing na qutux kawas. = =mrhuw Kokka' = mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi, aring ryax 27 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Yemen hya' ga cyox maki' tay 15 00 N, 48 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 527,968 sq km (maki' tay 50ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 527,968 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 27,392,779. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga44.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 1%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 54.50%. kinmhgan(Koka) qani ga,'boyan nya sqo kska na hezyal qo cinbwanan. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Sanaa. Kay ro gaga qnxan qqnxan pinbaqan = =snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' = snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 22 na tay ymagal byacing na qotox kawas. = =mrhow Kokka' = mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Abdrabboh Mansor Hadi, aring ryax 27 sqo byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2012 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
